    • Method Detail

      • addSafehouse

        public void addSafehouse(java.lang.String username,
                int level,
                java.lang.String colour,
                java.lang.String profession,
                java.lang.String party)
                  throws DatabaseException
        Add a safehouse instance to the database
        Parameters:
        String - username The name of the user who owns the house
        level - The user's level
        colour - The colour scheme chosen by the user
        String - profession The profession of the user (for customisation)
        String - party The party of the user (for customisation)
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • removeSafehouse

        public void removeSafehouse(java.lang.String username)
                     throws DatabaseException
        Removes a safehouse from the database
        Parameters:
        String - username The username of the user whose safehouse we wish to remove
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • getSafehouseByUsername

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSafehouseByUsername(java.lang.String username)
                                                        throws DatabaseException
        Get information about safehouse by username
        Parameters:
        String - username The name of the user whose safehouse we wish to retrieve
        Returns:
        Returns a list of safehouse information in order (level, colour, profession, party)
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
